mapper.select: select * from providers where ProviderId=#{ProviderId} and DeleteStatus = 1

select clicktable.id,clicktable.customerId,clicktable.goodId,clicktable.browseTime,clicktable.browseNum, case when goodbycustomer.buySum is null then 0 else goodbycustomer.buySum end, case when goodbycustomer.buyNum is null then 0 else goodbycustomer.buyNum end from clicktable LEFT OUTER JOIN goodbycustomer on clicktable.goodId=goodbycustomer.goodId and clicktable.customerId=goodbycustomer.customerId
